articles.title: Trump threatens 35% tariffs on Canadian imports
articles.description: President Donald Trump has threatened to impose a 35% tariff on imports of goods from Canada, set to take effect on August 1. The stated reason for the tariff is Canadaâ€™s alleged failure to stop fentanyl from entering the U.S.

articles.title: US Allies in Europe Project Aircraft Carrier Power Near China
articles.description: European NATO members, including the United Kingdom, France, and Italy, have projected naval power into the Indo-Pacific through aircraft carrier deployments, aiming to assist the U.S. in countering China's military buildup.

articles.title: Gen Z Homeowners Suffer Property Tax Shock
articles.description: A recent study found that nearly 90% of Generation Z homeowners underestimated the costs of ownership, with property taxes topping the list of unexpected expenses.
